fields.name: gpt_name
fields.description: The name or title of the custom GPT.

fields.name: category
fields.description: The main category under which the GPT falls.

fields.name: subcategory
fields.description: The specific subcategory for more granular classification.

fields.name: description
fields.description: A brief description of the custom GPT's purpose and functionality.

fields.name: created_date
fields.description: The date when the custom GPT was created.

fields.name: last_modified_date
fields.description: The date when the custom GPT was last modified or updated.

fields.name: status
fields.description: The current status of the custom GPT.

fields.name: version
fields.description: The version number of the custom GPT.

fields.name: tags
fields.description: An array of tags or keywords associated with the custom GPT.

fields.name: author
fields.description: The name of the person or team who created the custom GPT.

fields.name: target_audience
fields.description: The primary audience or user group for the GPT.

fields.name: language
fields.description: The language or languages the GPT is designed to work with.

fields.name: input_format
fields.description: The format of input data the GPT accepts (e.g., text, JSON).

fields.name: output_format
fields.description: The format of the output generated by the GPT.

fields.name: data_sources
fields.description: External data sources or APIs the GPT interacts with.

fields.name: training_data
fields.description: Description of the data used to train the GPT.

fields.name: model_size
fields.description: The size of the underlying model (e.g., number of parameters).

fields.name: dependencies
fields.description: Libraries or dependencies required for the GPT to function.

fields.name: operating_system
fields.description: The OS the GPT is compatible with (e.g., Windows, Linux).

fields.name: memory_requirements
fields.description: Minimum and recommended memory requirements.

fields.name: cpu_requirements
fields.description: Minimum and recommended CPU specifications.

fields.name: gpu_requirements
fields.description: Minimum and recommended GPU specifications.

fields.name: execution_time
fields.description: Average execution time for the GPT's operations.

fields.name: max_input_length
fields.description: The maximum length of input the GPT can handle.

fields.name: max_output_length
fields.description: The maximum length of output the GPT can generate.

fields.name: api_endpoint
fields.description: The API endpoint for accessing the GPT, if applicable.

fields.name: authentication
fields.description: Details about the authentication method for accessing the GPT.

fields.name: pricing_model
fields.description: The pricing model for using the GPT (e.g., free, subscription).

fields.name: license
fields.description: The license type under which the GPT is distributed.

fields.name: privacy_policy
fields.description: Link or details about the privacy policy related to the GPT.

fields.name: terms_of_service
fields.description: Link or details about the terms of service for using the GPT.

fields.name: ethical_considerations
fields.description: Any ethical considerations or guidelines for using the GPT.

fields.name: bias_mitigation
fields.description: Steps taken to mitigate bias in the GPT's outputs.

fields.name: data_security
fields.description: Measures taken to ensure the security of the data processed by the GPT.

fields.name: compliance_standards
fields.description: Compliance standards the GPT adheres to (e.g., GDPR, HIPAA).

fields.name: documentation_link
fields.description: Link to the documentation for the GPT.

fields.name: support_contact
fields.description: Contact information for support or inquiries about the GPT.

fields.name: use_cases
fields.description: A list of potential use cases for the GPT.

fields.name: limitations
fields.description: Known limitations or constraints of the GPT.

fields.name: performance_metrics
fields.description: Key performance metrics for the GPT (e.g., accuracy, speed).

fields.name: evaluation_methods
fields.description: Methods used to evaluate the GPT's performance.

fields.name: user_feedback
fields.description: Summary of user feedback or reviews.

fields.name: update_frequency
fields.description: How often the GPT is updated or improved.

fields.name: integration_compatibility
fields.description: Systems or platforms the GPT can integrate with.

fields.name: training_duration
fields.description: The time taken to train the GPT model.

fields.name: training_cost
fields.description: The cost associated with training the GPT.

fields.name: deployment_environment
fields.description: The environment in which the GPT is deployed (e.g., cloud, on-premise).

fields.name: backup_schedule
fields.description: The schedule for backing up the GPT's data and configurations.

fields.name: data_retention_policy
fields.description: The policy for retaining data processed by the GPT.

fields.name: scalability
fields.description: Scalability considerations for the GPT.

fields.name: api_documentation
fields.description: Link to the API documentation for the GPT.

fields.name: integration_examples
fields.description: Examples of how the GPT can be integrated into other systems.

fields.name: demo_link
fields.description: Link to a demo or live example of the GPT in action.

fields.name: related_projects
fields.description: List of related projects or GPTs.

fields.name: competitive_analysis
fields.description: Analysis of how the GPT compares to similar tools or models.

fields.name: market_positioning
fields.description: How the GPT is positioned in the market or among its competitors.

fields.name: user_manual
fields.description: Link to the user manual or guide for the GPT.

fields.name: setup_instructions
fields.description: Instructions for setting up or deploying the GPT.

fields.name: customization_options
fields.description: Details about customization options available for the GPT.

fields.name: localization
fields.description: Languages or regions the GPT is localized for.

fields.name: collaboration_tools
fields.description: Tools or platforms the GPT integrates with for collaboration.

fields.name: user_permissions
fields.description: Details about user permissions or access levels.

fields.name: error_handling
fields.description: Methods for handling errors or exceptions in the GPT.

fields.name: logging_mechanism
fields.description: Details about how logs are maintained for the GPT's operations.

fields.name: debugging_tools
fields.description: Tools available for debugging issues with the GPT.

fields.name: monitoring_tools
fields.description: Tools used to monitor the performance and health of the GPT.

fields.name: security_features
fields.description: Security features implemented in the GPT.

fields.name: encryption_standards
fields.description: Encryption standards used to secure data.

fields.name: authentication_methods
fields.description: Methods of authentication supported by the GPT.

fields.name: user_roles
fields.description: Different user roles supported by the GPT.

fields.name: documentation_language
fields.description: The language in which the documentation is written.

fields.name: platform_support
fields.description: Platforms the GPT supports (e.g., web, mobile).

fields.name: feedback_mechanism
fields.description: Mechanisms for collecting user feedback.

fields.name: user_interface
fields.description: Details about the GPT's user interface (e.g., command-line, GUI).

fields.name: user_experience
fields.description: Summary of the user experience provided by the GPT.

fields.name: accessibility_features
fields.description: Accessibility features included in the GPT.

fields.name: user_documentation
fields.description: Link to or details about the user documentation.

fields.name: onboarding_process
fields.description: Steps involved in onboarding new users to the GPT.

fields.name: customer_support
fields.description: Customer support options available for the GPT.

fields.name: support_availability
fields.description: Availability of customer support (e.g., 24/7, business hours).

fields.name: training_materials
fields.description: Links to or details about training materials for the GPT.

fields.name: tutorials
fields.description: Links to tutorials or guides for using the GPT.

fields.name: example_projects
fields.description: Examples of projects or applications built with the GPT.

fields.name: case_studies
fields.description: Case studies showcasing the use of the GPT in real-world scenarios.

fields.name: certifications
fields.description: Certifications or qualifications related to the GPT.

fields.name: community_forum
fields.description: Link to a community forum or discussion board for the GPT.

fields.name: faq
fields.description: Link to a frequently asked questions (FAQ) page for the GPT.

fields.name: release_notes
fields.description: Link to release notes or changelog for the GPT.

fields.name: feature_requests
fields.description: Details about or a link to a feature request page.

fields.name: support_tickets
fields.description: System or process for handling support tickets.

fields.name: performance_benchmarks
fields.description: Performance benchmarks for the GPT.

fields.name: integration_guides
fields.description: Link to guides for integrating the GPT with other systems.

fields.name: developer_tools
fields.description: Tools available for developers working with the GPT.

fields.name: api_keys
fields.description: Details about managing API keys for accessing the GPT.

fields.name: sandbox_environment
fields.description: Details about a sandbox environment for testing the GPT.

fields.name: deployment_guides
fields.description: Link to or details about deployment guides for the GPT.

fields.name: continuous_integration
fields.description: Details about continuous integration processes for the GPT.

fields.name: custom_commands
fields.description: Custom commands or configurations for the GPT.

fields.name: usage_limits
fields.description: Details about any usage limits or quotas for the GPT.

fields.name: api_throttling
fields.description: Details about API throttling or rate limits.
